org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.bee

Class Queen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.bee.Bee
        • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.bee.Queen

  • public class Queen
extends Bee
    A class to represent a Queen Bee of a hive.
